mapper.select: select info.id, info.order_no, info.start_location, info.end_location, if(info.status < 7, info.expect_amount, bill.pay_amount) as amount, info.status, info.create_time from order_info info left join order_bill bill on bill.order_id = info.id where info.customer_id = #{customerId} and info.is_deleted = 0 order by info.create_time desc
